typeparam.name: TException
typeparam.span: 块正在处理的异常的类型。

span.span: The type of exception that the block is handling.

summary.span: 包含要在 活动的对应 Try 块中引发了异常之后执行的操作。

span.span: Contains the actions to be executed after an exception is raised in the corresponding Try block of a activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器中，一次放置活动不能在设计器中重新排序。Once placed in the designer, activities cannot be reordered in the designer. 若要重新排序的集合活动，请删除并重新将其添加按正确的顺序，或使用工作流 xaml （代码） 视图。To reorder the collection of activities, either delete and re-add them in the correct order, or use the xaml (code) view for the workflow. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 活动。The following code sample demonstrates creating a activity. 此示例摘自[故障处理中流程图活动使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)示例。This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_FlowChartWithFaultHandling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_flowchartwithfaulthandling/cs/program.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异常处理程序由 对象表示。The exception handler is represented by a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何分配 活动的 Action 属性。The following code sample demonstrates assigning the Action property of a activity. 此示例摘自[故障处理中流程图活动使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)示例。This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
